message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair starting point!
You're being greedy, I'll give you a chance to get more in the next round!
I'll compromise, let's split it 45-55, a fair middle ground!
You're getting desperate, I'll take most of the cash while you get scraps!
I'll give you most of it, but I want to get something out of this deal too. 30-70 is my final offer!
You're getting close to nothing, I'll take almost all the cash!
I'll take the loss, I'm not accepting anything less than 50%
